channel.title: Comments on: Website Updates: Searching, Profiling, Making, Reserving

item.title: By: Dylan Romero
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description: Thank you for all your hard work Michele and Tab - the site looks really clean on a laptop, phone, and tablet!
item.content:encoded: Thank you for all your hard work Michele and Tab – the site looks really clean on a laptop, phone, and tablet!

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/03/20/website-updates-searching-profiling-making-reserving/#comment-652">Gail Persily</a>.
Oh! We can't take credit for that ... we noticed direct classroom links while browsing the https://edtech.ucsf.edu/medical-sciences-building page :-D
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Gail Persily.

Oh! We can’t take credit for that … we noticed direct classroom links while browsing the https://edtech.ucsf.edu/medical-sciences-building page ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Gail Persily
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/03/20/website-updates-searching-profiling-making-reserving/#comment-651">Julia Kochi</a>.
Yes - thanks for working with SAA to make those direct links to our classrooms possible!! That is HUGE!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Julia Kochi.

Yes – thanks for working with SAA to make those direct links to our classrooms possible!! That is HUGE!

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: Thanks for the updates! It makes it easier to keep track on what's changing on the website. And thanks very much for the return of the Reserve a Computer Classroom page. It will make scheduling classes easier.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the updates! It makes it easier to keep track on what’s changing on the website. And thanks very much for the return of the Reserve a Computer Classroom page. It will make scheduling classes easier.

item.title: By: Gail Persily
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description: Thanks for these updates about new content and features on the website. They are very helpful!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for these updates about new content and features on the website. They are very helpful!
